label: Virtual BF/DF
description: Calculates virtual bright field/dark field images from accumulated sparse frames.

outputs.name: image
outputs.label: Virtual BF/DF Image
outputs.description: Calculated virtual bright field or dark field image

parameters.name: calculation_frequency
parameters.label: Calculation Frequency
parameters.description: Number of frames to accumulate before recalculating the center and emitting a BF image.

parameters.name: inner_radius
parameters.label: BF Inner Radius (px)
parameters.description: Inner radius of the vBF/vDF (vBF ~0, vDF ~255).

parameters.name: outer_radius
parameters.label: BF Outer Radius (px)
parameters.description: Outer radius of the vBF/vDF (vBF ~75, vDF ~288).

parameters.name: subsample_step_center
parameters.label: Center Subsample Step
parameters.description: Step size for subsampling scan positions when calculating the center.

parameters.name: max_concurrent_scans
parameters.label: Max Concurrent Scans
parameters.description: Maximum number of scans to keep in memory simultaneously. Oldest scans are evicted when this limit is exceeded.
